WorkItem.Description:
Could You please add to FormatVertexEventArgs.VertexFormatter the position field?
 
So the User will be able to set the position of node during the *.dot file generation.
 
current generated :

...

digraph G {0 [ pos = "0,2!" ];1 [ pos = "0,0!" ];2 [ pos = "1,1!" ];...
 
It will be helpful for communication graphs visualization.
 
If possible please make the VertexFormatter.Position type System.Drawing.Point.
 
Thank you for great graph library.
 
              Misha
